live.name: LIVE
live.title: (Shooting on model / Furniture)
live.description: This smart studio system of 8m2 allows you to shoot your photos and videos of live models or scenographies in a few minutes. Saved camera and light presets.

horizontal.name: HORIZONTAL
horizontal.title: (Flat packshots)
horizontal.description: Horizontal allows you to style and shoot your products flat with the automatic removal of the background.

vertical.name: VERTICAL
vertical.title: (Ghost)
vertical.description: Choose ghost and give your products a 3D effect.

eclipse.name: ECLIPSE
eclipse.title: (Accessories / Leather goods / Shoes / Sunglasses)
eclipse.description: Designed for accessories photography and video. Saved camera and light presets.

cyclorama.name: CYCLORAMA
cyclorama.title: (Free production)
cyclorama.description: Our 30mÂ² cyclorama allows you to mobilize a production team and carry out your photo and video shoots on an endless white background.

postproduction.name: RETOUCHING
postproduction.title: (Post-production)
postproduction.description: In addition to our photo and video shooting services on our machines, we offer retouching services with different packages according to your needs.

pricing.title: Choose the service.s that suit you

cyclorama.description: Our cyclorama rental is by quote only. To receive a quote, please contact us using the form below with as much detail as possible about your needs. Our team will get back to you as soon as possible.

contact.title: Do you have any questions?
contact.subtitle: Any specific needs?
contact.description: Do not hesitate to contact us by filling in the form on the right. we will answer as soon as possible.

placeholders.message: An idea for a project, need a quote, make an appointment ? Write to us ;)
